props.title: Google Cloud Platform
props.toolTipText:
- Cloud computing is delivery of computing services
   - Servers
   - Storage
   - Databases
   - Networking
   - Software
   - Analytics
   - Intelligence, etc...

Features
- Its on-demand self service
- You will get a broad network access
- Resource pooling
- Rapid elasticity
- Measured services

Types
- IAAS - (servers, storage, networks, os, etc...)
- PAAS - (Kubernetes, App Services, etc...)
- SAAS - (Office 365, Databricks, etc..)

Types of services
- Compute - (compute engine, app engine, kubernetes, cloud functions)
- Networking - (VPC, loadBalancing, CDN, DNS)
- Storage & DB - (Cloud Storage, SQL, BigTable, Data Store, persistent Disk)
- IAM - (ResourceManager, IAM, SecurityScanner, Platform Security)
- Big data processing and management - (BigQuery, DataProc, DataLab, PubSub)
- Machine learning - (Cloud ML, Vision API, NLM API, Translation API, Speech API)
- Management tools - (StackDriver, Monitoring, Logging, Error Reporting, Trace)
- Development Tools - (SDK, Deployment Manager, source repository, TestLab)

- Any resource in GCP either be Zonal, Regional or Global 
- 22 Regions and 67 Zones across the globe
